92440.<color_yellow>「まちかど掲示板」の 説明です！<color_whi:
This will explain the the Town Bulletin Board!
This is a bulletin board where adventurers can post various information and communicate with other adventurers.
You can also view postcards posted by others in the Notification Square, as well as search for recruting Teams with Team Search.
It's also chock full of useful information for adventurers, such as World Rankings and Town Info.
These bulletin boards can be viewed in any town, so be sure to give it a look if you come across one!

93982.<speed=0>『まちかど掲示板』と書かれた掲示板に\n強モードボスの 討伐タ:
On a bulletin board labeled "Machikado Message Board," there's a ranking of the times it takes to defeat the strong mode
bosses.

93983.<speed=0>『まちかど掲示板』と書かれた掲示板に\n様々な情報が 貼りださ: There's a bulletin board labeled "Community Bulletin Board" with all kinds of information...

98317.今日のまちかど情報では\n各町で 毎日 ふくびき券がもらえる\nクエスト情報を:
With Today's Town Info, you can see various
quests that will earn you Lottery Tickets.

<speed=0>

<yesno><close>
